item.title: How Can I Possibly Vote for Rick Stream for County Executive?
item.description: Maybe this logic sucks, but this is my logic. When I vote, I ignore my positions on issues. Instead, I use my vote to advance two objectives: *1. I want my vote to improve policy towards liberty. *2. I want my vote to maximize my political power. A simple test that I ask myself is this: If I vote for A, do I expect resulting policy to be more or less to my liking?
